content:
Hmm? You won't let me see it?
Don't tell me... you're actually keeping some kind of martial arts secret?{紧张}

content:
Hmm? Why won't you let go?
...Perhaps you'd like to experience this extreme spiciness as well?
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付鱼任务_

content:
Oh, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
what have you discovered?
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付鱼任务_

content:
Hmm? You put it back?
Could it be... the quality wasn't sufficient? *elegant giggle*
Even in such small matters, you're quite meticulous.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付鱼任务_

content:
...{思考}This fish...
I'm not entirely certain if it was consumed by it.
I shall take it back for further examination.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付鱼任务_

content:
Impressive, even swifter than I hypothesized!
How fortunate to have a friend so skilled at fishing.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付鱼任务_

content:
I just did another quick count...
One, two, four, five... oh, it's become five now.
And with this <color=#8AAB4B>{任务物品}</color>, that makes six!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付鱼任务_

content:
Well then, here's a <color=#8AAB4B>thank-you gift</color> for you.
Thank you, my exclusive sponsor!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付鱼任务_

content:
Before we begin, please accept this <color=#8AAB4B>token of gratitude</color>,
Thank you for helping me solve this problem~.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付鱼任务_

content:
Hmm~ This fish... could it be that because its scales are colorless,
I'm not allowed to have it?
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付鱼任务_

content:
No worries, I'll do my best to make them spit it out while keeping them alive.
Here's your <color=#8AAB4B>reward</color> in advance.

content:
This is indeed the <color=#8AAB4B>{任务物品}</color> I need,
I believe it will add a tremendous—
Surprise to our competition!

content:
But... *whispers* Actually...
That little fish that disappeared? It came back!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付鱼任务_

content:

I'll share my color observations with you,
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, thank you.

content:
Hm? You won't give it to me?
